I prefix each mission with a projected date of completion (
is 2017, February), but this is totally up to you. I do this to get a good retrospective at the end of the year of all the missions I've completed.

children.value: There are a variety of other ways to keep track of your missions, including using plain notebooks and pens. What's important is you break your goals into manageable pieces, and give yourself a way to look back on your progress.
